document.full_text: the president returned to his political home here thursday for a fund-raising visit, bringing the message of fiscal responsibility and core democratic values he laid out in a speech a day earlier.
document.title: obama goes to chicago to talk money, and raise it
lines_and_colors: the president returned to his political home here thursday for a fund-raising visit, bringing the message of fiscal responsibility and core democratic values he laid out in a speech a day earlier.
